          <title>
            <string language="en">Attraction of unlike charges</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anziehung der verschiedenen Ladungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attraction des frais différents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Atração de cargas desiguais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Attrazione dalle delle spese dissimili</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έλξη αντίθετα από τις δαπάνες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Atracción de cargas desemejantes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The figures illustrate how a positively charged balloon attracts the negative charges of the neutral wall.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">negative charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">polarisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positive charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">positively charged</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">static electricity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">unlike charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Abbildungen veranschaulichen, wie ein positiv 
belasteter Ballon die negativen Ladungen der Nullwand anzieht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les figures illustrent comment un ballon 
franchement chargé attire les charges négatives du mur neutre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As figuras ilustram como um balão positivamente 
carregado atrai as cargas negativas da parede neutra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le figure illustrano come un aerostato 
positivamente caricato attrae le cariche negative della parete neutra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αριθμοί επεξηγούν πώς ένα θετικά χρεωμένο 
μπαλόνι προσελκύει τις αρνητικές δαπάνες του ουδέτερου τοίχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Las figuras ilustran cómo un globo positivamente 
cargado atrae las cargas negativas de la pared neutral.</string>
          </description>
